channel.title: launch on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in launch on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-13
item.description: ‘Unleashed’ Apple Event Focusing on New Macs to Take Place on October 18 (2 minute read) Apple will be holding its Unleashed event on October 18 at 10 am Pacific Time at the Steve Jobs Theater on the Apple Park campus in Cupertino.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-01
item.description: Apple’s big iPhone update lets you FaceTime with Windows and Android users — here’s how (2 minute read) Apple’s iOS 15 update lets iPhone users invite Windows and Android users to FaceTime calls.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-24
item.description: Nintendo Switch Online is getting an ‘expansion pack’ with N64 and Genesis games (1 minute read) The Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack will let Nintendo Switch Online members play Nintendo 64 and Sega Genesis games.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-16
item.description: How to Watch the World’s First All-Civilian Spaceflight Aboard a SpaceX Ship (3 minute read) Inspiration4 is set to launch on September 15.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-26
item.description: Google parent Alphabet launches Intrinsic: a new company to build software for industrial robots (3 minute read) Intrinsic is a new company from Alphabet that focuses on building software for industrial robots.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-20
item.description: Peloton plans to launch an in-app video game where you pedal to control a rolling wheel (2 minute read) Lanebreak is Peloton’s new in-app video game that involves riders changing their cadence and resistance to meet goals and control an on-screen rolling wheel.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-15
item.description: Amazon bought Facebook’s satellite team to help build its Starlink competitor (3 minute read) Amazon has purchased Facebook’s small-satellite division.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-09
item.description: Apple in talks with Chinese battery makers for Apple Car (2 minute read) Apple is allegedly talking to two major Chinese battery makers about supplying batteries for its electric vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-31
item.description: Nvidia is making a 3D map of the universe with the world’s most powerful AI supercomputer (2 minute read) Nvidia’s Perlmutter supercomputer is the fastest in the world for AI workloads.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-04
item.description: Apple is reportedly working on a foldable iPhone for 2023 (2 minute read) Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo says that Apple plans to launch an 8-inch foldable iPhone by 2023.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-13
item.description: Apple reportedly developing an Apple TV with a built-in camera and speaker (2 minute read) Apple is developing a new TV accessory that combines the Apple TV with a HomePod speaker and camera for video calls.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-01
item.description: Microsoft says hackers were able to see some of its source code (1 minute read) Microsoft’s systems were infiltrated by hackers who could view source code from a number of repositories.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-23
item.description: Elon Musk says Apple refused a meeting to acquire Tesla (2 minute read) Elon Musk attempted to sell Tesla to Apple during the Model 3 rollout in 2017.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-14
item.description: What to expect from Apple’s ‘Time Flies’ event: Apple Watch Series 6, a redesigned iPad Air, and more (4 minute read) Apple’s ‘Time Flies’ event will be on September 15.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-21
item.description: The easiest way to start meditating is now in… Snapchat? (4 minute read) Snap Minis are small apps that are designed to be used through Snapchat’s chat function.
